trans-unit.source: Blob Service REST API
trans-unit.target: Blob Service REST API

trans-unit.source: The Blob service stores text and binary data as blobs in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The Blob service stores text and binary data as blobs in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: The Blob service offers the following three resources: the storage account, containers, and blobs.
trans-unit.target: The Blob service offers the following three resources: the storage account, containers, and blobs.

trans-unit.source: Within your storage account, containers provide a way to organize sets of blobs.
trans-unit.target: Within your storage account, containers provide a way to organize sets of blobs.

trans-unit.source: You can store text and binary data in one of the following types of blobs:
trans-unit.target: You can store text and binary data in one of the following types of blobs:

trans-unit.source: Block blobs, which are optimized for streaming.
trans-unit.target: Block blobs, which are optimized for streaming.

trans-unit.source: Append blobs, which are optimized for append operations.
trans-unit.target: Append blobs, which are optimized for append operations.

trans-unit.source: Page blobs, which are optimized for random read/write operations and which provide the ability to write to a range of bytes in a blob.
trans-unit.target: Page blobs, which are optimized for random read/write operations and which provide the ability to write to a range of bytes in a blob.

trans-unit.source: For more information about block blobs and page blobs, see <link xlink:href="2de10e66-46cd-4bbe-98ec-aba34bf22c4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding Block Blobs and Page Blobs</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about block blobs and page blobs, see <link xlink:href="2de10e66-46cd-4bbe-98ec-aba34bf22c4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding Block Blobs and Page Blobs</link>.

trans-unit.source: The REST API for the Blob service defines HTTP operations against container and blob resources.
trans-unit.target: The REST API for the Blob service defines HTTP operations against container and blob resources.

trans-unit.source: The API includes the operations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The API includes the operations listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Operation
trans-unit.target: Operation

trans-unit.source: Resource Type
trans-unit.target: Resource Type

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Account
trans-unit.target: Account

trans-unit.source: Lists all of the containers in a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Lists all of the containers in a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Account
trans-unit.target: Account

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties of the Blob service, including logging and metrics settings, and the default service version.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties of the Blob service, including logging and metrics settings, and the default service version.

trans-unit.source: Account
trans-unit.target: Account

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Blob service, including logging and metrics settings, and the default service version.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Blob service, including logging and metrics settings, and the default service version.

trans-unit.source: Account
trans-unit.target: Account

trans-unit.source: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Blob service prior to sending the actual request.
trans-unit.target: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Blob service prior to sending the actual request.

trans-unit.source: Account
trans-unit.target: Account

trans-unit.source: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.
trans-unit.target: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Creates a new container in a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new container in a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Returns all user-defined metadata and system properties of a container.
trans-unit.target: Returns all user-defined metadata and system properties of a container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Returns only user-defined metadata of a container.
trans-unit.target: Returns only user-defined metadata of a container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Sets user-defined metadata of a container.
trans-unit.target: Sets user-defined metadata of a container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Gets the public access policy and any stored access policies for the container.
trans-unit.target: Gets the public access policy and any stored access policies for the container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Sets the public access policy and any stored access policies for the container.
trans-unit.target: Sets the public access policy and any stored access policies for the container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Establishes and manages a lock on a container for delete operations.
trans-unit.target: Establishes and manages a lock on a container for delete operations.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Deletes the container and any blobs that it contains.
trans-unit.target: Deletes the container and any blobs that it contains.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Lists all of the blobs in a container.
trans-unit.target: Lists all of the blobs in a container.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Creates a new blob or replaces an existing blob within a container.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new blob or replaces an existing blob within a container.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Reads or downloads a blob from the Blob service, including its user-defined metadata and system properties.
trans-unit.target: Reads or downloads a blob from the Blob service, including its user-defined metadata and system properties.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Returns all system properties and user-defined metadata on the blob.
trans-unit.target: Returns all system properties and user-defined metadata on the blob.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Sets system properties defined for an existing blob.
trans-unit.target: Sets system properties defined for an existing blob.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all user-defined metadata of an existing blob or snapshot.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves all user-defined metadata of an existing blob or snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Sets user-defined metadata of an existing blob.
trans-unit.target: Sets user-defined metadata of an existing blob.

trans-unit.source: Block, append and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Marks a blob for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Marks a blob for deletion.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Establishes and manages a lock on write and delete operations.
trans-unit.target: Establishes and manages a lock on write and delete operations.

trans-unit.source: To delete or write to a locked blob, a client must provide the lease ID.
trans-unit.target: To delete or write to a locked blob, a client must provide the lease ID.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Creates a read-only snapshot of a blob.
trans-unit.target: Creates a read-only snapshot of a blob.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Copies a source blob to a destination blob in this storage account or in another storage account.
trans-unit.target: Copies a source blob to a destination blob in this storage account or in another storage account.

trans-unit.source: Block, append, and page blobs
trans-unit.target: Block, append, and page blobs

trans-unit.source: Aborts a pending <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, and leaves a destination blob with zero length and full metadata.
trans-unit.target: Aborts a pending <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, and leaves a destination blob with zero length and full metadata.

trans-unit.source: Block blobs only
trans-unit.target: Block blobs only

trans-unit.source: Creates a new block to be committed as part of a block blob.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new block to be committed as part of a block blob.

trans-unit.source: Block blobs only
trans-unit.target: Block blobs only

trans-unit.source: Commits a blob by specifying the set of block IDs that comprise the block blob.
trans-unit.target: Commits a blob by specifying the set of block IDs that comprise the block blob.

trans-unit.source: Block blobs only
trans-unit.target: Block blobs only

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.

trans-unit.source: Page blobs only
trans-unit.target: Page blobs only

trans-unit.source: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.

trans-unit.source: Page blobs only
trans-unit.target: Page blobs only

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of valid page ranges for a page blob or a snapshot of a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of valid page ranges for a page blob or a snapshot of a page blob.

trans-unit.source: Append blobs only
trans-unit.target: Append blobs only

trans-unit.source: Writes a block of data to the end of an append blob.
trans-unit.target: Writes a block of data to the end of an append blob.
